meanings.definition: A member of an ancient people said to have lived beyond the North Wind.
meanings.sent1: The hyperboreans were believed to have lived in a mystical land.
meanings.sent2: The hyperboreans were said to dwell in a distant, cold realm.
meanings.sent3: The hyperboreans must have had some amazing stories to tell!
meanings.sent4: Legends speak of the hyperboreans as beings of great wisdom and mystery.
meanings.sent5: In tales, the hyperboreans were described as ethereal beings beyond imagination.

meanings.definition: A native or inhabitant of a region lying to the north of the ordinary human habitation.
meanings.sent1: The hyperboreans from the icy lands were skilled hunters.
meanings.sent2: Many believe the hyperboreans lived in a frozen land of endless winter.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a hyperborean trying to adapt to a tropical climate!
meanings.sent4: To some, the hyperboreans symbolize resilience in harsh environments.
meanings.sent5: The hyperboreans' homeland was shrouded in perpetual frost and snow.
